MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG4 postcode area of Sanquhar. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30PM to safely carry repair work on our underground cable network at Kelloholm and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex nature of the fault and complex repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:55pm on 14 January 2021.
